price: A ako bude jedan od onih koji su poricali i u zabludi ostali,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
